event.description: If specified, the game event with this namespace and ID will be prevent from being emitted by the entity.
event.markdownDescription: If specified, the game event with this namespace and ID will be prevent from being emitted by the entity.

events.description: If specified, the game events with these namespace and IDs will be prevent from being emitted by the entity.
events.markdownDescription: If specified, the game events with these namespace and IDs will be prevent from being emitted by the entity.

tag.description: If specified, the game events inside game event tag will be prevented from being emitted by the entity.
tag.markdownDescription: If specified, the game events inside game event tag will be prevented from being emitted by the entity.

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity upon preventing game events.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity upon preventing game events.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_game_event)

Prevents specified game event(s) from being emitted by the entity that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:prevent_game_event`


!!! note

    See [Minecraft Wiki: Sculk Sensor (Vibration amplitudes)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Sculk_Sensor?oldid=2099339#Vibration_amplitudes) for a list of vanilla game events you can check for.
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_game_event)

Prevents specified game event(s) from being emitted by the entity that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:prevent_game_event`


!!! note

    See [Minecraft Wiki: Sculk Sensor (Vibration amplitudes)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Sculk_Sensor?oldid=2099339#Vibration_amplitudes) for a list of vanilla game events you can check for.
